A C D E G I M N O P R S U V 

U

Update - Class in callable
Update is a callable used by CaptorMonitor in order to notify Displays that a new state was generated.
Update(CaptorAsync) - Constructor for class callable.Update
A simple constructor mapping the reference to attribute.
update(CaptorState) - Method in class canal.Canal
update creates the update callable and call scheduleUpdate to return a future to caller.
update(Diffusion) - Method in class canal.Canal
Useless in our case because we use a custom update returning a Future.
update(CaptorState) - Method in interface canal.observer.ObsCaptorAsync
update will create the callable and returns its result as Future thank to scheduler.
update(CaptorAsync) - Method in class client.DisplayMonitor
Notify DisplayMonitor that a new value was released.
update(SubjectMonitor) - Method in class ihm.ValueUI
Update the showing value of the IHM according to the state of subject
update(T) - Method in interface observer.Observer
